title: 113. Changing Guest Services in Casual Dining | Coopers Hawk Winery
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Tim McEnery, the founder and chief executive officer of Cooper's Hawk Winery & Restaurants. Based in Illinois, Cooper’s Hawk is the unique restaurant chain that also crafts its own premium wine, offering fifty unique blends through its suburban Woodridge production facility.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
